title: 高清修复崩溃
author: chanay
txt_content: 手残了下，自从我装了高清修复之后我经常是OPENGL ERROR 1286，请问怎么不让他崩溃！

replies.author: chanay
replies.txt_content: 标题: 高清修复崩溃

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
chanay 发表于 2016-5-5 15:59
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!
内存不足，尝试重启客户端，如果有安装MOD的话请删除大型MOD，也可以为客户端增加内存。

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content: 请贴出crash-report文件夹内的错误报告

replies.author: chanay
replies.txt_content:
